subraces.name: Pitchburner
subraces.description:
You are resistant to Fire damage.

When fighting an opponent in melee range that you cannot see, if you can hear them, you do not suffer disadvantage on attack rolls against them and they do not gain advantage on attack rolls against you due to their hidden nature.

subraces.name: Runtboss
subraces.description: You have Trained proficiency with the Intimidation or Persuasion skill.

generalPerks.name: Brave
generalPerks.description: You have advantage on saving throws against being frightened.

generalPerks.name: Martial Culture
generalPerks.description: You gain Trained proficiency in the Athletics skill.

generalPerks.name: Saving Face
generalPerks.description: If you miss an attack roll or fail an ability check or saving throw, you can gain a bonus to the roll equal to the number of allies you can see within 30 feet (max +5). You can use this ability once per day.

generalPerks.name: Hobgoblin Combat Training
generalPerks.description: You are proficient with all weapons.

generalPerks.name: Formation Training
generalPerks.description: You gain the following reaction: If you are the target of an attack while next to an ally, you can give yourself a +1 bonus to your defense against that attack.

generalPerks.name: Keen Senses
generalPerks.description: You have advanced hearing and smell, and have advantage on perception checks relating those senses.

generalPerks.name: Low-Light Vision
generalPerks.description: You can see in dim light as though it were by torchlight, but cannot see in darkness.
